summary: Test suite that validates the correctness of fused sequence‑parallel operations (all‑gather + linear and linear + reduce‑scatter) by comparing their outputs against the equivalent non‑fused implementations across various data types, using subprocesses for isolation.
business_intent: Guarantee that fused sequence‑parallel kernels in the library produce numerically identical results to the standard operations, ensuring reliability and facilitating performance optimizations for large‑scale transformer models.
